message.content: Hey folks! I'm Will, a part of the amazing group of extremely talented gameplay engineers here at S6. We're working super hard to make sure our experience developing it is just as pleasant and comfortable as yours is playing it! We've been enjoying the heck out of playing our game and dying to share it with everyone, but honestly we never in our wildest dreams expected anything like this! You blew our socks off, no joke, so much happy tears and / or ugly crying. Thank you so much, can't wait to see you guys in game!
